projectData.name: Mosele.Afrika
projectData.summary: A platform for South African authors to showcase, crowdfund, and sell books.  This is an MVP that showcases the core features of the platform, including book listings, crowdfunding campaigns, secure payment processing through PayFast and allows the owner to personally update the color theme, main website text and logo. The platform is designed to empower local authors and provide a seamless experience for readers.
responsibilities: Managed end-to-end project lifecycle including planning, UI/UX design, implementation and testing.
Lead early iterations of the frontend planning phase through effective communication via meetings  and task delegation within the team.
Implemented the frontend using React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.
Implemented the backed using NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB.
Implemented state management and API interactions using Redux Toolkit and RTK Query.
Integrated PayFast payment gateway for secure transactions.

projectData.name: The Hive
projectData.summary: The Hive is a full-stack web application designed to facilitate the management of students, mentors and the content associated with them. It allows Mentors to create, read, update and delete Assignments, Curricula, create Students and mark students assignments. Students can view assignments, curricula and mentors and complete their assignments. projectData.name: Immergence Studios
projectData.summary: This is the official website for Immergence Studios, an animation studio focused on producing world-class animation content. This website represents an exercise in designing, from themes, picking colors to creating an engaing atmosphere.

projectData.name: Aegis Vault
projectData.summary: A high-immersion, mystical-themed e-commerce platform designed with a 'Cinzel' and 'Crimson Text' aesthetic. It features a responsive shopping cart and real-time quantity updates.
responsibilities: Developed a synchronized cart system where UI updates optimistically while syncing with a backend API.
Implemented a 'Mystical Autumn' design system using custom Tailwind CSS utility layers for gradients, glows, and animations.
Built a scalable Express backend with TypeScript, featuring global error handling and modular routing.
Optimized user experience by implementing a custom 'Summoning' loading ritual for initial data fetching and a ScrollToTop utility for seamless navigation.
Deployed a serverless Node.js architecture on Vercel with MongoDB Atlas integration.
